articles.description: Jordan Mailata worked in construction while trying to become a rugby league player in Australia but has now completed his unique journey to Super Bowl winner.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: Philadelphia Eagles' Jordan Mailata completes 'greatest story in football'

articles.description: Guillem Balague examines the problems that have led Manchester City and Real Madrid to meet in the Champions League play-off.
articles.title: Champions League: Man City & Real Madrid fighting for their lives

articles.description: Espanyol accuse Barcelona and Spain defender Mapi Leon of "violating the privacy" of their player Daniela Caracas following an incident in a Liga F game on Sunday.
articles.title: Mapi Leon: Barcelona defender accused of violating privacy of Espanyol's Daniela Caracas

articles.description: President Trump and Taylor Swift in attendance as Philadelphia Eagles beat Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl 59 at Caesars Superdrome, New Orleans
articles.title: Super Bowl 59: President Trump, Taylor Swift watch Philadelphia Eagles beat Kansas City Chiefs

articles.description: Tiger Woods withdraws from this week's Genesis Invitational at Torrey Pines as he is "still processing" the death of his mother.
articles.title: Tiger Woods withdraws from Genesis Invitational as he 'still processing' death of his mother

articles.description: Opener Ben Duckett says he does not care if England are beaten 3-0 in their one-day series in India, as long as they win the Champions Trophy.
articles.title: India v England: Ben Duckett says Champions Trophy success would justify series defeat

articles.description: Celtic winger Daizen Maeda is free to face Bayern Munich in Wednesday's Champions League play-off first leg after a two-match ban was reduced.
articles.title: Headline here...

articles.description: India's Ishpreet Singh Chadha produced one of the performances of his career to knock out defending champion Gary Wilson in the first round of the Welsh Open.
articles.title: Welsh Open: Chadha knocks out defending champion Wilson in first round

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, watch fifth-round draw, score updates and match stats from Doncaster Rovers vs Crystal Palace in the FA Cup
articles.title: Watch Doncaster Rovers vs Crystal Palace LIVE: FA Cup score, updates & fifth-round draw

articles.description: World Athletics plan to introduce a swab test for elite athletes who wish to compete in the women's category at international events, tightening eligibility regulations for transgender and difference of sex development (DSD) athletes.
articles.title: World Athletics plan swab tests set to decide female athlete eligibility
